task.title: Conducting exploratory interviews
task.shortdesc: Exploratory interviews gather context about paranormal phenomena.

taskbody.context: Interviews are a useful way to gather information about supposed experiences with paranormal phenomena. Speaking to those who experienced the phenomena can provide important context about the site and help determine if further investigation is needed.

step.cmd: Send survey to collect preliminary information about why they believe a haunting is taking place
Determine if investigation is necessary based on survey responses
Contact interviewee(s) to set up a time and place to discuss their experiences
Develop specific, open-ended questions to gather additional information about experiences shared in the survey
Meet with the participants and carefully document their answers
